server.title: Server
server.description: If Smart Gateway is set up to use basic or form login authentication, set Server to 'user:pass@ipadress'.

roomid.title: Room ID
roomid.description: If Room ID is set to 0 homebridge loads ALL sensors. Room ID is Smart Gateway roomplanâ€™s idx number

mqtt.title: Enable MQTT
mqtt.description: By default, the plugin will grab hardware information regarding MQTT from Smart Gateway if MQTT is checked.

ssl.title: Enable SSL
ssl.description: You will need to specify your SSL port - usually Port 443 by default.

dimFix.title: Dim Offset
dimFix.description: The dimFix variable relates to an early issue between HomeKit and Smart Gateway regarding scaling of dimmer values. If you find that you can never set your dimmers to 100%, then set this variable to 1. If you find that, when you set your dimmers, this starts a never ending loop of brightness increasing by 1%, then you MUST omit this variable or set it to 0.

items.helpvalue:
Exclude Devices
To prevent certain Smart Gateway devices from showing up in HomeBridge, add IDX of the device.
